titles: Bethel, or, A forme for families in which all sorts of both sexes, are soe squarde and framde [sic] by the word, as they may best serue in theire seuerall places, for usefull peices in Gods buildinge / by Mathew Griffith.
author: Griffith, Matthew, 1599?-1665.
publisher: Printed for Ro. Allott and Hen. Taunton, and are to be sold at their shops at ye Black Beare in Paules Churchyard & in St. Dunstons Churchyard Fleetstreete,
notes: Imperfect: lacks all but engraved t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
